room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by NWA Escape Room in Fayetteville (AR)
room_description: As members of the Scotland Yard force, your group is tasked with investigating the suspected hideout of Professor James Moriarty, the criminal mastermind bent on destroying Sherlock Holmes.  Holmes is en route to Whitehall, where he expects Moriarty to strike next.   Before heading out, though, Holmes gave Inspector Lestrade a scrap of paper with scribbled address where he suspects the criminal hideout to be.  You must find and search the secret location while avoiding any traps or snares Moriarty might have designed to protect his lair.  Rumor has it that no one has ever entered this hideout and escaped alive...
